title: Curried mussels
ingredients: ['8 shallots, minced', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '350ml (12 fl oz) dry white wine', '1 (227ml) pot double cream', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '32 mussels - cleaned and debearded', '30g (1 oz) butter', 'handful minced parsley', 'good handful chopped spring onions']
